commit.message: Fix ui tests for `fn`s with qualifiers in `extern` blocks

verification.payload:
tree 9317fada4735f8eb07f825794d46f7d9bca5eb8d
parent 92aa0e6295c39db945966d080236931396e59939
author ThePuzzlemaker <tpzker@thepuzzlemaker.info> 1605476091 -0600
committer ThePuzzlemaker <tpzker@thepuzzlemaker.info> 1605621478 -0600

Fix ui tests for `fn`s with qualifiers in `extern` blocks

files.patch:
@@ -108,9 +108,12 @@ error: functions in `extern` blocks cannot have qualifiers
 LL |     extern {
    |     ------ in this `extern` block
 LL |         async fn fe1();
-   |         ---------^^^
-   |         |
-   |         help: remove the qualifiers: `fn`
+   |                  ^^^
+   |
+help: remove the qualifiers
+   |
+LL |         fn fe1();
+   |         ^^

   --> $DIR/fn-header-semantic-fail.rs:52:19
